briefTitle: Vildagliptin/Metformin in T2DM Patients Starting Basal Insulin
officialTitle: Randomized, Open-label, SU-controlled Study of 24-week Duration to Compare Metformin/Vildagliptin + Basal Insulin Versus Metformin/SU + Basal Insulin in T2DM Patients Starting Basal Insulin After Failing Metformin/SU
summary: To compare a therapeutic strategy combining vildagliptin+metformin + Basal Insulin versus SU+metformin + Basal Insulin on the incidence of hypoglycemic events over 24 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Patients Who Reported at Least One Symptomatic Hypoglycemic Event During the 24 Week Randomized Period in Both Treatment Arms
